name: Head (Base)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="HeadGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,220,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,170,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="FaceHighlight" cx="50%" cy="70%" r="40%" fx="50%" fy="70%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,220,240);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="150" fill="url(#HeadGrad)" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="280" rx="100" ry="80" fill="url(#FaceHighlight)" />
  <circle cx="220" cy="240" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="292" cy="240" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 256 320 Q 256 340, 276 320" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="5" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Ear (Left)

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,170,200);stop-opacity:1" />

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,220,240);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 Q 100 100, 256 50 Q 312 100, 256 400 Z" fill="url(#EarGrad)" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 170 380 Q 150 150, 256 80 Q 280 150, 256 380 Z" fill="url(#EarInnerGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Mouth (Happy/Open for Lip-sync)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="MouthInteriorGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,0,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="TongueGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 200 300 C 220 350, 292 350, 312 300 Z" fill="url(#MouthInteriorGrad)" stroke="#660000" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 220 320 Q 256 340, 292 320" fill="url(#TongueGrad)" stroke="#9C5C7C" stroke-width="2" />
  <rect x="246" y="300" width="20" height="30" fill="#FFFFFF" rx="5" ry="5" />
</svg>

</svg>

<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <linearGradient id="EarBentGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,220,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,170,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 362 400 Q 412 100, 256 150 Q 312 100, 412 250 Z" fill="url(#EarBentGrad)" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>
